definitions.definition: Concerned with or used in improving the appearance of the face .
On its face ; as it appears ( as opposed to on a more probing analysis, as it is applied , etc. ) .
examples: The facial constitutionality of the law is in question.
labels: of a law or regulation validity
label_groups: of a law or regulation validity

main_definition: ( relational ) Of or affecting the face .
secondary_definitions: ( medicine , relational ) Concerned with or used in improving the appearance of the face .
( transferred sense , law ) ( of a law or regulation validity ) On its face ; as it appears ( as opposed to on a more probing analysis, as it is applied , etc. ) .
